summary: AFTER BUYING CAR I NOTICED AN AIR LEAK SOUND COMING FROM THE BACK DRIVERS SIDE WINDOW.  BEFORE I COULD BRING IT BACK TO THE DEALERSHIP THE BACK WINDOW COMPLETELY SHATTERED WHILE DRIVING HOME ONE NIGHT.  THE ENTIRE BACK SEAT WAS COVERED IN GLASS.  LUCKILY NO ONE WAS IN THE BACK SEAT.  SERIOUS INJURY WOULD HAVE OCCURRED.  NO EVIDENCE OF AN OBJECT BREAKING THE WINDOW.  DEFINITELY A DEFECT WITH THE WINDOW.  *NLM
